resources.string: Lime Scooter\n\n Click Button to Ride, Tap Anywhere Else to Go Back
Bird Scooter\n\n Click Button to Ride, Tap Anywhere Else to Go Back
Please enter a valid phone number
Login complete! Press return to go back.
Could not log into your Bird account. Please try again.
An access token will be sent by Bird to your email. This will look like a random string of characters and numbers. Copy and paste the token below:
Enter your Lime account phone number:
Login complete! Press return to go back.
Could not log into your Lime account. Please try again.
A 6-digit code will be sent by Lime to your phone number. Copy and paste the code below:
Welcome! To use our app, sign in to your account(s), then click the return button and click the locate button in the top right of the map to view nearby scooters.
A list of the scooter apps the user has registered with.
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for this demo.
Could not access the Lime authentication server. Try another number/email or try again later.
Could not access the Bird authentication server. Try another number/email or try again later.
